means: 德黑兰（伊朗首都）德黑兰

sentence.Network_en: The shock waves of the earthquake were felt in Teheran.
sentence.Network_cn: 地震带来的冲击波在德黑兰也能感觉到。

sentence.Network_en: Towards the centre of Teheran these crowds were four or five deep.
sentence.Network_cn: 在接近德黑兰城的中心时,密集的人群有四、五层.

sentence.Network_en: Stalin was insistent that this should take place at Teheran.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯大林坚持这个会议应在德黑兰举行.

means.word_mean: 1. the capital and largest city of Iran; located in northern Iran

auth_sentence.content: It reaches from plush Teheran to the remotest villages.

auth_sentence.content: Back in Teheran, I found mounting turbulence and confusion.

auth_sentence.content: The Paris agreement obliges Teheran to suspend its uranium conversion and enrichment activities.
